articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: India vs South Africa: No Bavuma, Rabada in ODIs and T20Is; Markram to captain - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Aiden Markram will captain the T20I and ODI squads, while the Test squad will be led by Temba Bavuma. | Cricket
articles.content: South Africa have rested batter Temba Bavuma for its home white-ball series against India this month after a poor Cricket World Cup, but he will captain the team in the two-Test series which starts o… [+2841 chars]
